HDG.IM.content: from question “Why are there beings at all instead of nothing?” we’ve extracted the prior question (Vor-frage): How does it stand w/ Being? [Nietzsche’s putting first last [fixerup]]
HDG.IM.linkedContent: from question “Why are there beings at all instead of nothing?” we’ve extracted the prior question (Vor-frage): How does it stand w/ Being? [Nietzsche’s putting first last [fixerup]]

HDG.IM.content: spirit is what sustains/rules, first & last [first last], not merely indispensable 3rd element > cultural values secure meaning, restricted to their standards of self-validity: poetry for poetry’s sake, art for art’s sake, science for science’s sake > [no longer question thus no longer spiritual?] > re: science and situation of university, a situation unchanged despite some cleansing [Nazi?]
HDG.IM.linkedContent: spirit is what sustains/rules, first & last [first last], not merely indispensable 3rd element > cultural values secure meaning, restricted to their standards of self-validity: poetry for poetry’s sake, art for art’s sake, science for science’s sake > [no longer question thus no longer spiritual?] > re: science and situation of university, a situation unchanged despite some cleansing [Nazi?]

HDG.BC.content: knowing, standing, a stance, knowing ground is more originary, more far-reaching [value], more decisive: this knowing is character itself > a claim upon us, exhorted (angesprochen) [addressed] > meleta to pan, “take into care beings as a whole”: always consider the essential, first & last [put last first]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: knowing, standing, a stance, knowing ground is more originary, more far-reaching [value], more decisive: this knowing is character itself > a claim upon us, exhorted (angesprochen) [addressed] > meleta to pan, “take into care beings as a whole”: always consider the essential, first & last [put last first]

HDG.BC.content: modern position is the “technological,” epoch is technological, already decided mode of world-interpretation: interprets possibilities for any human attitude, preforms them acc. their capacity for implementation > practical mastery of technology presupposes metaphysical subjugation to technology, grasp everything acc. plan/calculation, to secure what can last for longest possible duration > Nietzsche clearly envisioned that this will [of technology] would attain unconditional shape in 20th century, unconditional mastery of earth

HDG.BC.content: Nietzsche’s “being” as “last breath of a vaporizing reality”: what happens to ontological difference in this disappearance [can’t Nietzsche affirm a more ancient difference, i.e. differance?]?
HDG.BC.linkedContent: Nietzsche’s “being” as “last breath of a vaporizing reality”: what happens to ontological difference in this disappearance [can’t Nietzsche affirm a more ancient difference, i.e. differance?]?

HDG.IWM.content: via time as preliminary name Being is unconcealed, concealed essence of time speaks in first metaphysical names for Being & in its last name: “eternal recurrence of the same” [EROS] [is Being a metaphysical name for Being?]
HDG.IWM.linkedContent: via time as preliminary name Being is unconcealed, concealed essence of time speaks in first metaphysical names for Being & in its last name: “eternal recurrence of the same” [EROS] [is Being a metaphysical name for Being?]

HDG.QB.content: “Question concerning Technology” owes lasting debt to descriptions in The Worker
HDG.QB.linkedContent: “Question concerning Technology” owes lasting debt to descriptions in The Worker

HDG.MA.content: if Gelassenheit awakens in us, arrive at path that will lead to new ground: in that ground, creativity that produces lasting works could strike new roots
HDG.MA.linkedContent: if Gelassenheit awakens in us, arrive at path that will lead to new ground: in that ground, creativity that produces lasting works could strike new roots

HDG.DL.content: “originarily familiar (anfänglich Vertraute)”: what is entrusted to our nature, becomes known last [the only thing Heidegger’s thinking pursues, proximity to meaning of Being, etc.]
